pullrequest.title: Prevent xml parser error from crashing LogPlay on osx -> gazebo7

content.raw:
update: e4ae3e5 - fixes `NoEndTag` test. Sorry to push the changes after approvals. It was a simple fix - problem was that std::string length() is unsigned and hence `-1 - endTag.length()` evaluates to a large positive number.

queued [jenkins job](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-i386-gpu-none_temp/)
content.html:
update: e4ae3e5 - fixes NoEndTag test. Sorry to push the changes after approvals. It was a simple fix - problem was that std::string length() is unsigned and hence -1 - endTag.length() evaluates to a large positive number.

queued jenkins job
